name: The Hunt (itch) (WaterPlug)
description:
Travel through a pitch black forest with only your flashlight as you attempt to discover 10 Sodas. Discover all sorts of fun silly easter eggs that tell the story of previous adventurers like you. Also remember... YOU ARE BEING HUNTED...

Controls - wasd/arrows and move your flashlight with your mouse. Esc. to pause the game. Because the monster can spawn very close you must have very fast reflexes to avoid him.

goal - find 10 sodas randomly generated throughout the forest and collect them by touching them. Oh and don't get killed by the hunter.

Be sure to tweet @moistwaterplug and tell me what you thought of the game and maybe how you would've made it. Good luck, I hope you enjoy !
